Weighted LDA Models

Source: vignettes/pkgdown_files/Weighted_LDA.Rmd
Weighted_LDA.Rmd

Weighted LDA

library(keyATM)
data(keyATM_data_bills)
bills_dfm <- keyATM_data_bills$doc_dfm  # quanteda object
keyATM_docs <- keyATM_read(bills_dfm)
out <- weightedLDA(docs             = keyATM_docs,  # text input
                   number_of_topics = 7,            # number of topics
                   model            = "base",       # select the model
                   options          = list(seed = 100))
top_words(out)
##        Topic_1    Topic_2     Topic_3       Topic_4  Topic_5   Topic_6
## 1         loan    section    national       project    state education
## 2      federal      shall    research         water    court    school
## 3  information        act     program administrator   person     grant
## 4       safety      state      center      wildlife   action   federal
## 5       entity subsection     science  conservation  federal      drug
## 6      patient  secretary  technology       federal      law   student
## 7          use        may   committee       coastal    class    direct
## 8      product  paragraph    director    management attorney      rate
## 9   commission        sec development        system    crime  borrower
## 10 corporation       year      change          fish   united   percent
##       Topic_7
## 1       child
## 2         new
## 3     license
## 4       minor
## 5       abuse
## 6      permit
## 7  commercial
## 8       space
## 9     foreign
## 10   abortion

Weighted LDA Covariates

library(keyATM)
data(keyATM_data_bills)
bills_dfm <- keyATM_data_bills$doc_dfm  # quanteda object
bills_cov <- keyATM_data_bills$cov
keyATM_docs <- keyATM_read(bills_dfm)
out <- weightedLDA(docs             = keyATM_docs,   # text input
                   number_of_topics = 7,             # number of topics
                   model            = "covariates",  # select the model
                   model_settings   = list(covariates_data = bills_cov),
                   options          = list(seed = 100))
top_words(out)
##        Topic_1   Topic_2  Topic_3  Topic_4   Topic_5       Topic_6
## 1      federal    health    state     loan    action       program
## 2  information     child    court  federal     class      national
## 3          use   program   person    water   federal         grant
## 4       safety      care   united wildlife      rule      research
## 5       system   veteran attorney  coastal    member        center
## 6       entity provision      law calendar qualified           use
## 7       report   medical    crime  student     court      activity
## 8   regulation    relate     code borrower     civil       project
## 9         work     pilot  chapter     fish     claim          fund
## 10  government     minor district     plan      file administrator
##       Topic_7
## 1     section
## 2       shall
## 3         act
## 4       state
## 5  subsection
## 6   secretary
## 7         may
## 8         sec
## 9        year
## 10  paragraph

Weighted LDA Dynamic

library(keyATM)
data(keyATM_data_bills)
bills_dfm <- keyATM_data_bills$doc_dfm  # quanteda object
bills_time_index <- keyATM_data_bills$time_index
bills_time_index <- as.integer(bills_time_index - 100)
keyATM_docs <- keyATM_read(bills_dfm)
fitted <- weightedLDA(docs             = keyATM_docs,  # text input
                      number_of_topics = 7,            # number of topics
                      model            = "dynamic",    # select the model
                      model_settings   = list(time_index = bills_time_index, 
                                              num_states = 5),
                      options          = list(seed = 100))
top_words(out)
##        Topic_1   Topic_2  Topic_3  Topic_4   Topic_5       Topic_6
## 1      federal    health    state     loan    action       program
## 2  information     child    court  federal     class      national
## 3          use   program   person    water   federal         grant
## 4       safety      care   united wildlife      rule      research
## 5       system   veteran attorney  coastal    member        center
## 6       entity provision      law calendar qualified           use
## 7       report   medical    crime  student     court      activity
## 8   regulation    relate     code borrower     civil       project
## 9         work     pilot  chapter     fish     claim          fund
## 10  government     minor district     plan      file administrator
##       Topic_7
## 1     section
## 2       shall
## 3         act
## 4       state
## 5  subsection
## 6   secretary
## 7         may
## 8         sec
## 9        year
## 10  paragraph
